title: You Are Poisoning Yourself
itunes:title: You Are Poisoning Yourself
description:
Episode 286 - What good does it do to hold on to anger? Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die. In this episode, I dive into anger and how it is a learned behavior which can be unlearned.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
